title: President Donald J. Trump’s Historic Tax Cuts Are Delivering Real Savings And Creating More Opportunity For All Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
April 15, 2019
There has never been a better time to start living the American Dream.
						President Donald J. Trump					PROVIDING A HELPING HAND TO MIDDLE-INCOME FAMILIES: President Trump’s tax cuts are providing a boost to middle-income families.PUTTING MORE MONEY IN WORKERS’ POCKETS: The TCJA has led to higher wages, increased benefits, big bonuses, and new employment opportunities for workers.  LAUNCHING A BUSINESS BOOM: America is open for business again thanks to President Trump’s historic tax cuts. LIFTING UP FORGOTTEN COMMUNITIES: The TCJA created Opportunity Zones to bring investment and opportunity to communities that have been left behind.
